column1: This  appeal  is  from  the  judgment,  delivered  by  the  learned  Judge  of  the  High  Court  of
Puttalam, dated  02.11.2017, by  which,  the  accused-appellant,  who  is  before this  court  via
zoom platform, was convicted and sentenced to death for having murdered Siththi Kuressiya
(the deceased) and committing the offence of murder, under section 296 of the Penal Code.
The charge against the accused persons was as follows;
